title: InFeRno - an Intelligent Framework for Recognizing Pornographic Web Pages

author: Sotiris Karavarsamis, Department of Computer Science, University of Ioannina

segmentation: Hello, my name is Judy, risk averse, amison.
I'm another graduate student with the Department of Computer Science, University of Vienna, Greece.
I will not present you Inferno, which is an intelligent framework for recognizing pornographic web pages based on the visual content contained in web pages.
This is a joint work with my advice or constructive blockers and Nico.
Dance.
OK, so the motivation behind this work is that there are a lot of bad pages out out there.
They utter all the time in our search and perhaps someone.
Wants to block access to that content.
But the problem is that.
That exists is that the such webpages?
Are quite many, so we can't classify them manually, so we need an intelligent system to do this for us.
So one of the driving goals of this project is that.
We need to determine minimal but powerful vector space that when combined with younger tools.
Method yields very good results.
And we also introduced bikini class that strengthens the performance of the SVM classifier that we use.

And we also introduced a multiclass SVM classification scheme and then we glued all these things into follow into a final solution, which is a server based on the ICAP protocol that can be easily integrated with any well known aids to be proxy server.
OK, so let me say a few things about the architecture.
OK, we have a typical scenario.
Here we have a client that.
Once to fetch a web page from.
From the web.
So when we have our system employed on our network, the client sends a request to to an intermediate HD proxy server and the HTTP proxy server forwards this request to our own system.

It parses the document object model of the web page, fetches all the images in parallel, then classifieds them, then it classifieds them an IT fuses.

Skin detection algorithm which provides us with a binary version of the image indicating the regions of the image containing skin tone.
And then we use younger tools method in order to localize a region of interest in that image.
If we find.
A contour on this image.
Then we extract 15 features from the pixels enclosed by the contour.
And then we fit this into our multi class SVM classification scheme which provides us with the prediction for the image.
OK, so here are some experimental results.
We manually downloaded a set of porn bikini and benign images from the web because there are no publicly available datasets for this reason, and we compared our.
System with a EU funded or easier project.
We compared our classification system with that of poezia angwe.
We had a four times speedup improvement on our data set and the accuracy was found to be compareable to that of cohesion.
OK, so that would be all thank.
